parameters.definition: Maximum production amount under regular conditions
Cost of production under regular conditions per unit
Cost of production under overtime conditions per unit
Cost to store one unit of product

description: Formulate the problem of determining the production schedule that minimizes the cost, where the demand for each product is given by \param{Demand}, the maximum production amount under regular conditions is \param{MaxRegularAmount}, cost of regular production per unit is \param{CostRegular}, cost of production under overtime conditions per unit is \param{CostOvertime}, and the cost to store one unit of product is \param{StoreCost}.
